Class Album

  • Object
    • Album

  • public class Album
extends Object
    An Album object represents a collection of pictures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Album(String title)
      Constructs a new empty Album object with the specified title.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPicture(Picture pic)
      Adds a picture to this album.
      int getNumPictures()
      Returns the total number of pictures in this album.
      int getNumPicturesOfCategory(char cat)
      Returns the number of pictures in this album of the specified category.
      int getNumPicturesTakenIn(String monthAndYear)
      Returns the number of pictures taken in the specified month and year in the format of "month/year" (for example, "9/2013" for September 2013).
      int getNumPicturesWithFewerPixelsThan(int numPixels)
      Returns the number of pictures in this album which has fewer pixels than the specified number of pixels.
      Picture getPicture(String title)
      Returns a Picture object with the specified title or null if no such picture can be found in this album.
      String getTitle()
      Returns the title of this album.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Album

        public Album(String title)
        Constructs a new empty Album object with the specified title.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of this album.

    • Method Detail

      • getTitle

        public String getTitle()
        Returns the title of this album.
        Returns:
        The title of this album.

      • addPicture

        public void addPicture(Picture pic)
        Adds a picture to this album.
        Parameters:
        pic - The picture to be added.

      • getPicture

        public Picture getPicture(String title)
        Returns a Picture object with the specified title or null if no such picture can be found in this album.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the picture to be found.
        Returns:
        The picture with the specified title or null if it cannot be found in this album.

      • getNumPictures

        public int getNumPictures()
        Returns the total number of pictures in this album.
        Returns:
        The total number of pictures.

      • getNumPicturesWithFewerPixelsThan

        public int getNumPicturesWithFewerPixelsThan(int numPixels)
        Returns the number of pictures in this album which has fewer pixels than the specified number of pixels.
        Parameters:
        numPixels - The number of pixels used as the search criterion.
        Returns:
        The number of pictures which has fewer pixels than the specified number of pixels.

      • getNumPicturesOfCategory

        public int getNumPicturesOfCategory(char cat)
        Returns the number of pictures in this album of the specified category.
        Parameters:
        cat - The category used as a search criterion.
        Returns:
        The number of pictures of the specified category.

      • getNumPicturesTakenIn

        public int getNumPicturesTakenIn(String monthAndYear)
        Returns the number of pictures taken in the specified month and year in the format of "month/year" (for example, "9/2013" for September 2013).
        Parameters:
        monthAndYear - A string that specifies a particular month of a particular year in the format of "month/year". For example, "9/2013" represents September 2013, "12/2011" represents December 2011.
        Returns:
        The number of pictures which are taken during the specified month and year.
